text: The Drake is a luxurious Hilton hotelList of Addresses- AreaG2 Chicago Hotels in Chicago, Illinois. It is located downtown on the lake side of Michigan Avenue two blocks north of the John Hancock Center and a block south of Oak Street Beach at the top of the Magnificent Mile. Overlooking Lake Michigan. It was founded in 1920. ==References== Category:Hotels in the United States Category:Buildings and structures in Chicago
title: Drake Hotel (Chicago)
